channel.title: Duke University Press on
channel.description: Recent content in Duke University Press on

item.title: The Right to Maim
item.description: In The Right to Maim Jasbir K. Puar brings her pathbreaking work on the liberal state, sexuality, and biopolitics to bear on our understanding of disability.

item.title: Staying with the Trouble
item.description: Drawing from the Greek roots khthon (earth) and kainos ([[notes/concepts of time|time]]), Haraway coins Chthulucene as an alternative to the monikers Anthropocene or Capitalocene as labels for these turbulent times.
